title: Triangular Flag on Post

verbs: To hold up to public blame or reproach; to advertise opprobriously; to denounce by public proclamation.
Affix in a public place or for public notice
To affix in a public place or for public notice.
Change location; move, travel, or proceed, also metaphorically
To change (from one value to another).
To move or travel (from one location to another).
To change the location of an object.
To transfer a file from one location to another. After the file is transferred, there is only one copy of the file, in the new location.
To move an object one pixel at a time.

nouns: Emblem usually consisting of a rectangular piece of cloth of distinctive design
A flag is a piece of fabric with a distinctive design that is used as a symbol, as a signaling device, or as decoration.
A piece of cloth, often decorated with an emblem, used as a visual signal or symbol.
Piece of fabric with a distinctive design
A stone milepost (or by extension in other materials), one of a series of numbered markers placed along a road at regular intervals, typically at the side of the road or in a median.
One of a series of numbered markers placed along a road at regular intervals.
Stone post at side of a road to show distances
Numbered marker along a road or boundary
A milestone is one of a series of numbered markers placed along a road or boundary at intervals of one mile or occasionally, parts of a mile.

description: A triangular red flag on a post. Most commonly associated with golf, as shown in the flag in hole emoji. Can also be used to represent the term red flag, signaling a problem or issue.
apple_vendor_description: Appleâ€™s triangular flag emoji appears as a vibrant pennant, its fabric rippling slightly with a sense of gentle movement brought to life by realistic lighting. The smooth gradients and soft rounded edges of the flagâ€™s form give it a tactile, almost tangible quality on Apple devices. This emoji on Apple devices commonly represents a starting point, a marker, a signal, or the announcement of something new and exciting, often used to draw attention to a specific location or event.
